353590.name: Grow Home Soundtrack DLC
353590.description:
Sit back, relax and soak in the electro-pop dream that is the Grow Home Soundtrack DLC.
Featuring 2 music tracks that will fill you with 8-bit nostalgia as you help Bud grow his way back to his space ship!
“BUD's Theme” – A bright, gleeful track that will bring even more joy to your Grow Home Adventure.
“Star Plant Theme” – Strap in for sci-fi as you listen to this spacey track that will fuel your journey to reach the stars.
